name: Notification of Appointment Discontinuation
description: Notification sent when an appointment in progress is stopped or remaining occurrences of a parent appointment will not occur
businessPurpose: Notify systems when an appointment that has already begun must be stopped or when remaining occurrences of recurring appointments will not take place
timing: Sent when decision is made to discontinue an in-progress appointment or stop future occurrences of a parent appointment
realWorldScenarios: Surgery discontinued mid-procedure due to patient complications
Recurring physical therapy sessions stopped due to patient recovery
Ongoing clinical trial appointments discontinued due to adverse effects
Series of chemotherapy treatments halted per oncologist decision
Long-term monitoring appointments discontinued after condition resolution
Dialysis session stopped early due to patient distress

generationRules.requiredDataQuality: Critical - discontinuation affects patient safety, billing, and resource planning
